title: how to report a bug?
body:
i was playing a ranked game 2 days ago and i was adc as caitlyin vs warwick as jungler and i tried top use my E  ( throw the net at him ) to slow him n get out of the his ulti range , yet he manged to run fast n ulti me in the same time as i was using my  E so i managed some how to get out of his range yet he ulted me and i did recive all the ultimate damage  , thr funny part the animation  was like  am out of his range  while he doing his ulti i was like far away from him but freezed in the air and he far away from me but he ulting me , so 
my question is that bug is that just animation bug , and how i used my e and he manged to use his ultimate in the same time and we both not connected at all we like 300 range fare away from each other ,  please ppl help i wanna understand

replies.body: thanks so much it make lots of since and i think that was good exponentiation enough and am happy with it so i would just ignore it i guess, i only wanted to help as i do care about the game and thanks again for your time

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report

Try the 'Report a bug' section xD, I'd imagine it is just a bug where two scripts have been completed and because you were within Warwicks ult range as you pressed E you would have just done it within the perfect moment and the game would have registered you still as within the ult range and thus applied the correct suppression debuff and dmg for the duration :p just like when you dunk someone {{champion:122}} as long as thus player was in range and your R was proc'd whilst they were even if they flash you will still complete your ult as it was activated and I don't feel there is an easy fix around it personally
